entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] [RC2] Conditional ToolbarItem Text Display Using OnIdiom Not Working in Release Mode #18697
  • [iOS/Catalyst] CollectionView scrolling performance when height is not constrained drops drastically. #18696

Closed

  • androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18689
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨
